flawed_nl_solution:
When Trevor is 11, his older brother will be 11 x 3 = <<11*3=33>>33 years old.
Trevor’s older brother is 20 - 11 = <<20-11=5>>5 years older than Trevor.
Since Trevor is 5 years younger, Trevor will be 33 - 5 = <<33-5=28>>28 years old.
#### 28

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
